attributes.action: Stop DUP and Sinn Fein pay if they do not strike a deal soon.
attributes.background: The situation should not be tolerated given all the stresses that people face at this time e.g. NHS waiting lists, insufficient social care for the elderly, automation of skills, lower incomes, increasing inflation, etc.

rejection.details:
The salaries of MLAs are determined by the Independent Financial Review Panel. You can find out more about the IFRP here:

http://ifrp.org.uk/
